description: Example queries for L3 M13.1 Multi-Tenant Performance Patterns

queries: What were our Q4 sales performance metrics?
Show me the top 10 performing products this quarter
Which regions exceeded their sales targets?
Compare our sales performance year-over-year
What is the company policy on remote work?
Show me the annual review process timeline
What are the benefits available to employees?
Explain the promotion criteria for senior engineers
What was our EBITDA for the last fiscal year?
Show me the budget allocation by department
What are the compliance requirements for financial reporting?
Analyze our cash flow trends over the last 6 months
What are the contract terms for vendor agreements?
Show me the compliance checklist for GDPR
What is our liability in case of data breaches?
Summarize the intellectual property protection policies
How do I troubleshoot login issues?
What is the escalation process for critical tickets?
Show me the SLA commitments for premium customers
What are the common issues reported this month?

test_scenarios.expected_behavior: First call misses cache, second call hits cache

test_scenarios.query: Complex query with long processing time
test_scenarios.expected_behavior: Should timeout at 200ms for platinum tier

test_scenarios.query: Same query text for both tenants
